notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Funding has been granted through the National Health and Medical Research Council (NHMRC), acting as grant administrator for the Medical Research Future Fund (MRFF) as of January 2018.
The funder had no role in the design nor interpretation of results.

The medicinal cannabinoids to be used in this study are to be supplied by Little Green Pharma. Little Green Pharma will not be involved in the protocol development, interpretation, publication or dissemination of results.
